DOC.brief_summary: This follow-up primary series vaccination schedule Study A3L24 ( NCT01177722 ) . The objective : - To describe antibody persistence antigen contain investigational DTaP-IPV-Hep B-PRP-T vaccine Infanrix hexa™ prior booster dose - To describe safety immunogenicity booster dose either DTaP-IPV-Hep B-PRP-T Infanrix hexa™ vaccine . - To describe immunogenicity booster dose Prevenar™ give 12 24 month .
DOC.brief_title: Study Booster Effect DTaP-IPV-Hep B-PRP~T Combined Vaccine Infanrix Hexa™ Prevenar™ Healthy Infants
DOC.detailed_description: All participant complete trial A3L24 ( NCT01177722 ) recruit participate trial . Those received DTaP-IPV-Hep B-PRP-T combine vaccine randomize receive either booster dose DTaP-IPV-Hep B-PRP-T Infanrix hexa™ vaccine . Those received Infanrix hexa™ receive booster dose DTaP-IPV-Hep B-PRP-T combined vaccine . All participant receive booster dose Prevenar™ concomitantly .
DOC.criteria: Aged 12 24 month day inclusion . Informed consent form sign dated parent ( ) legally acceptable representative ( independent witness ( es ) require local regulation ) . Subject parent/guardian able attend schedule visit comply trial procedure . Toddlers previously include Study A3L24 complete threedose primary series vaccination either DTaPIPVHep BPRP~T Infanrix hexa™ 2,4 6 month age accord protocol ( concomitantly administer Prevenar™ Rotarix™ ) . Participation another clinical trial investigate vaccine , drug , medical device , medical procedure 4 week precede booster vaccination . Planned participation another clinical trial present trial period . Receipt vaccine 4 week precede booster vaccination , except case pandemic influenza vaccination , may receive least two week study vaccine . Planned receipt vaccine 4 week follow trial vaccination . Previous booster vaccination pertussis , tetanus , diphtheria , poliomyelitis , Haemophilus influenzae type b , hepatitis B pneumococcal infection ( ) either trial vaccine another vaccine . Receipt blood bloodderived product past 3 month , might interfere assessment immune response . Known suspected congenital acquire immunodeficiency ; receipt immunosuppressive therapy anticancer chemotherapy radiation therapy within precede 3 month ; longterm systemic corticosteroid therapy ( prednisone equivalent 2 consecutive week within past 3 month ) . Laboratoryconfirmed clinical suspicion personal maternal seropositivity Human Immunodeficiency Virus ( HIV ) , hepatitis B , hepatitis C , report parent/guardian . History pertussis , tetanus , diphtheria , poliomyelitis , Haemophilus influenzae type b , hepatitis B pneumococcal infection ( ) , confirm either clinically , serologically , microbiologically . At high risk opportunistic infection trial . Known systemic hypersensitivity vaccine component , history lifethreatening reaction vaccine ( ) use trial vaccine contain substance . History contraindication receipt pertussiscontaining vaccine . Laboratoryconfirmed clinical suspicion thrombocytopenia contraindicate Intramuscular vaccination . Bleeding disorder , receipt anticoagulant 3 week precede inclusion , contraindicate intramuscular vaccination . History seizure . Chronic illness , opinion investigator , stage might interfere trial conduct completion . Receipt oral inject antibiotic therapy within 72 hour prior first blood draw Febrile illness ( temperature ≥ 38.0°C ) moderate severe acute illness/infection ( accord investigator judgment ) day vaccination .
